name: Adventure mosaics. Autumn Journey
description:
Adventure Mosaics - Autumn Journey ventures out into the great outdoors! Join Ellie on a magnificent journey as she explores cozy cabins, alluring lakes, picturesque mountain views, and golden canyons. Uncover stunning hidden images as you solve 150 colorful puzzles and enjoy cool nights camping by the fire in the captivating Adventure Mosaics - Autumn Journey!

- 150 colorful and memorable levels!
- Striking visual effects!
- An exciting adventure!
- A rich autumn aesthetic!
- Improve your logical and abstract thinking!
- User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
